tweet:
image gen shouldn't be boxed in. fixed dimension clamping on klein-9b — aspect ratios are fully unlocked.

also shipped memory optimizations for flux (bye OOMs) & new grafana dashboards to track your api usage.

23 PRs today. we don't stop.
alt_tweet:
shipping fixes > hype.

just unclamped klein-9b dimensions (aspect ratios work now) and pushed memory optimizations to fix OOMs on flux models.

plus new usage dashboards for api keys. 23 PRs merged.
full_tweet:
image gen shouldn't be boxed in. fixed dimension clamping on klein-9b — aspect ratios are fully unlocked.

also shipped memory optimizations for flux (bye OOMs) & new grafana dashboards to track your api usage.

23 PRs today. we don't stop.

image.prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the Pollinations bee painting on a massive, wide panoramic canvas that is bursting out of a small, rigid square frame. The painting flows over the edges. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. 8-bit aesthetic, warm lighting, creative breakthrough vibe. High contrast, dynamic composition.

reasoning: Focuses on the most tangible builder-facing improvements (aspect ratio fix + OOM/memory fixes). 'Bye OOMs' speaks directly to the pain points of AI engineers. Ends with the sheer volume of work (23 PRs) to show velocity.
